description:
Chase is a surfer dude. He spends all his free time in the waves and he's got a body to match. His hair is sun-bleached (right down to his eyebrows!) and though he may look like he's shaved off his pubes, they are just blonde as the rest of him.
I had asked him if he was stoned, cuz his delivery was the epitome of stoned beach bum. It actually kind of irritated him that I had asked. He says everyone says that about him, but he quickly pointed out that he's "not a fan of the 420."
He's uncut, and its a little frustrating as his skin never completely peels all the way back. He keeps his hot dog in the bun. If you like long foreskins, you will be ecstatic. If you hate'm, all I can say is, "tune in next week."
This video does have a bit a surprise twist to it half way through, so don't jump to the cumshot (I know you do.)
A very small number of these "straight" guys do put themselves on the line because they are working through sexuality issues. For the most part, the guys do it for the money, but I wonder about Chase.
Maybe his cool surfer dude affectation is hiding a boy who should be playing on our team!
title: Chase Thomas - Solo
